kb3.name: kb3_feeds
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_feeds` ( `feed_id` INT(11) AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL, `feed_url` text NOT NULL, `feed_lastkill` INT(11) NOT NULL, `feed_updated` datetime default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `feed_kbsite` VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, `feed_flags` TINYINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`feed_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
